Articles.Content:
NOMORE BUTTONS! OKAY! now you need to work for jeb Bob 13:37 anyway let me introduce myself now I had played ksp over a year but never had time to make a account for the forums that may be bigger than minecraft or the earth... but no buttons or be punished and work for jeb ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

and welcome to EpicX rocketry gardens warranty does not cover for damages if jeb used it no refunds... the end....

Buttons? What's this about buttons?

And err... welcom, welcome. Enjoy your permanent stay. Muahahaha!

Welcome aboard EpicX, although I have no idea what this business about buttons is! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Regards,

Northstar
The staging buttons are just horrifying
